segments.text: I need to make a copy of a document as soon as possible .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No problem , sir . There's a copy machine in our computer lab .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Very good . How much does each copy cost ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Each copy will cost you a dime , sir .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: A dime ? I remember when copies used to cost a nickel .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: There aren't many things you can get for a nickel , sir .
segments.speaker: S2
